reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and appreciate its softness, with one noting it's a wonderfully soft light-mid weight piece.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Super cute and comfy, true to size. Soft material. Clings in all the right places. Light weight material - not too thick Read more
items.author: DH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good material, Nice Style, True to size
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised at this sweater. It just looks pretty basic in the photo even on the model, but it feels good, is substantial but not heavy, but also not too light. It's not a super tight knit, but tight enough to make it look a bit better, so to speak. Holds its shape well. I tried it on when it arrived, and while I try to be careful with items just in case they won't work and I need to return them, you really couldn't even tell I had tried it on. It fits well in the shoulders, not overly structured or anything, but not frumpy like some sweaters can look. The crew neck is not too high or too low in my opinion. It doesn't have any weird places that are too tight when you cross your arms or reach for something, the bottom doesn't hike up. I don't know if those things are important to you, and I usually wear a cami under most things. In this case I was rocking it preppy with a crisp white Oxford shirt underneath that had a nice collar and cuffs. The sleeves are probably a pretty perfect length for most people, I would surmise. I am not that tall, and I did have enough sleeve that I could fold back a little so you could see my cuffs lol! I just wanted that preppy clean look. The cuffs were not obnoxious or anything. If you are a taller person or just have longer arms, I suspect it would just be a normal arm length for you. And as a shorter person, even if you don't roll back the cuffs, the way it is made still looks very deliberate and good in my opinion. If you are a person that likes to push your sleeves up to your elbows, I'm not sure on that because I did not try to wear it that way. The sweater hits at I'd say a normal hip length. I suppose that would depend on how tall a person is, and potentially how much girth lol! I am 5'3 and 1/2, 185 lb. So I have some girth, but I also ordered an extra large which is my usual size right now and did fit me perfectly in my opinion. I got khaki and something called apricot, I believe, to compare. I say "I believe" because I'm leaving this review on my phone and I'm afraid to click away and mess up the review lol! But it was not orangey at all. Maybe the most subtlest hint of being something off of khaki, maybe a blush or a super light peach, but I would hate to give it any strong connotation of a heavy color deposit, because it is so very subtle. I will confess that even on flash sale where I paid around $25 for it, that felt a bit high because I just don't tend to put significant dollars into clothing. I tend to put dollars into shoes. The apricot color went better with my overall outfit that I was putting together for a semi-casual work thing. I was planning to wear it with a skirt that I did not size well and did not look good, so ended up wearing it with Palazzo pants which came together really well actually. Think you could dress this sweater up or down really. If you have space, you could wear a blazer over it to dress it up, or put a certain type of jewelry with it, or do a mix and dress it up, but wear some sneakers or something. I think it's just very versatile and functional. Went with the apricot color because of the direction I ended up having to go with the outfit, but the khaki was really nice too. I have this feeling you really couldn't go wrong with this sweater in any color. At least for me it was a great purchase. And I would have kept the khaki except I got it on flash sale and the current price is more than I want to pay. Perhaps it'll be a little better by the time you read this and decide to purchase. That turned into a stream of consciousness, but I hope it helps. I think it's worth the purchase if you are a person who's willing to pay over $25 for a sweater, and I guess somewhere along the lines, I became that person for this sweater! Read more
items.author: CtheAmazonian

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a lightweight sweater
items.body: Its lighter in color and heavier in weight than I expected. It seems well made and fits well. Read more
items.author: Homgrn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm. soft, and pretty.
items.body: This is a light, soft, comfortable sweater. The fabric is densely knit, so it's warm, even though it's lightweight. It layers nicely, without being bulky. I've bought two of these in different colors. It laumders well. The fabric does not pill. It's a good buy. Read more
items.author: Tonstant Weader 2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm, lightweight
items.body: Warm, comfy and not itchy lightweight, perfect for office or social events. Tag does Not irritate. True to recommended size, fits well. Band hits around the top of hips, which is a perfect length for me at 5 ft 3. Read more
items.author: LBH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater. This brand of clothes seems to know what’s up. I’ve never been disappointed with anything they sell. I bought this for my MIL for Christmas and I think she will love the color, and the fit. Material is in the middle for weight and thickness. The material is not too constricted, and has some stretch to it. Read more
items.author: Julie K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely buy this sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater. It’s so soft and comfy. It’s the perfect length to wear with leggings. It’s longer than what’s shown in the picture (good thing). The white is not see through. The material is high quality. Perfect for winter and cooler weather. My favorite sweaters that I have. I loved it so much I went back and got 6 more in different colors. Absolutely love these sweaters. I got them on sale. Great sweater and a great price. Read more
items.author: Samie2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The material is great!
items.body: I love this sweater! The material is so soft and it looks exactly like the picture. It is NOT cheaply put together. The size is perfect and so versatile that you can either dress it up with dress pants for work or dress it down with jeans, it looks great either way! Read more
items.author: Barbara

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Forest Green, Nutmeg, Army Green, Black, Black White, Coffee, Dark Gray, Khaki White, Brick Red, Light Blue, Navy, Almond, White, Grey Taupe. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
